riskModels.map

Class MapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • riskModels.map.MapModel

  • public class MapModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will perform operation related to MapObj created from MapFile

    1.0
    Author:
    Akshay and Prashant

      • assignContinentToNeighbors

        public static java.util.HashMap<Country,java.util.List<Country>> assignContinentToNeighbors(java.util.List<Country> countryAndNeighbors)
        This method will assignContinent to Neighbor countries
        Parameters:
        countryAndNeighbors - It is same List returned while reading [Territories] part
        Returns:
        HashMap ,Which will have Country as a key and List of Country (neighbors) as a Value.it will help to create graph

      • readTerritories

        public static java.util.List<Country> readTerritories(java.io.BufferedReader bufferReaderForFile)
        This method will read [Territories] part of map file
        Parameters:
        bufferReaderForFile - BufferedReader class object as param
        Returns:
        List of Country.Every single object of country will have countryname,continentname,start/end pixels;

      • readContinents

        public static java.util.List<Continent> readContinents(java.io.BufferedReader bufferReaderForFile)
        This method will read the continent part of map file
        Parameters:
        bufferReaderForFile - BufferReader object that read the .map file for continent
        Returns:
        List of Continent. every single object of the list contains continentName and number of countries it hold.

      • getCountryObj

        public static Country getCountryObj(java.lang.String countryName,
                                    GameMap gameMap)
        This method finds the country from the gameMap object and returns the country object if present
        Parameters:
        countryName - pass the name of the country to find from the gameMap as a string
        gameMap - GameMap class object from which intended country need to be return
        Returns:
        country object

      • readMapFile

        public GameMap readMapFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        This method will read the mapfile and provide data to creategraph
        Parameters:
        filePath - path of .map file
        Returns:
        Function will return the map details obj

        public GameMap validateMap(GameMap mapDetails)

        Parameters:
        mapDetails - mapDetails that we have parsed from .map file
        Returns:
        mapDetails with correct error message.

        Returns:
